nodes.text: N'dian was a planet located in the N'dian system, a part of the Spadja sector within the Outer Rim Territories and Trans-Hydian regions.

By the time of the Clone Wars, it was the site of several urban centers. A Separatist group was believed to be hiding in one of the cities during that conflict. As a result, during the first year of the war, Ordo, a Null-class Advanced Recon Commando of the Grand Army of the Galactic Republic, was sent to the planet to assault the city. The ensuing battle was highly intense, with Ordo almost completely destroying the city single-handedly in order to achieve his mission objectives.
During a counterterrorism operation on the Core Worlds planet Coruscant in 22 BBY, Ordo discussed his mission to N'dian with the clone commando RC-1207.

N'dian was first mentioned in the 2006 novel Republic Commando: Triple Zero, written by Karen Traviss. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the N'dian system, and therefore the planet N'dian, within grid square R-6.
